ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMSP F17 Special Sensors-Ions, Electrons, and Scintillation (SSIES) Thermal Plasma Analysis Package, Level 2 (L2), 1 s Data in CDF Format

RevisionEvent.Note: Metadata created by ADAPT code (LFB), final editing and DOI minting by AK

ResourceHeader.Description: The Special Sensors-Ions, Electrons, and Scintillation (SSIES) thermal plasma analysis package is a suite of instruments built by the Center for Space Sciences at the University of Texas at Dallas and flown on a number of the DMSP satellites. SSIESS includes a Retarding Potential Analyzer (RPA), Ion Drift meter (IDM), scintillation meter, and Langmuir probe.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We gratefully acknowledge the University of Texas Dallas, Center for Space Sciences and the US Air Force for providing the DMSP thermal plasma data

PublicationInfo.Authors: Hairston, Marc, R.; Coley, William, R.; Heelis, Roderick, A.; Hanson, William, B.

InformationURL.Name: Original HDF files
InformationURL.Description: HDF files used to convert to CDF files at SPDF

InformationURL.Name: Thermal Plasma Plots
InformationURL.Description: Single orbit plots of plasma data

AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftps from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via https from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: We gratefully acknowledge the University of Texas Dallas, Center for Space Sciences and the US Air Force for providing the DMSP thermal plasma data

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

Parameter.Name: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Default time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: vx
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vx - median filtered and smoothed ion flow in the ram direction
Parameter.Caveats: median filtered and smoothed ion flow in the ram direction from the fits to the RPA curve

Parameter.Name: quality flag for Vx data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Vx quality flag:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: vx rms
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vx root mean square of the RPA fit
Parameter.Caveats: root mean square of the fit to the RPA curve giving an indication of the quality of the RPA data for this sweep

Parameter.Name: Vx flow
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vx - original unfiltered Vx flow
Parameter.Caveats: the unfiltered Vx flow values calculated by the RPA fitting routine

Parameter.Name: vy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vy - ion flow in the horizontal crosstrack direction
Parameter.Caveats: crosstrack horizontal ion flow from IDM, positive is in the sunward direction regardless of the orientation of the orbit, data taken in two modes: normal and slow (see nmbpts)

Parameter.Name: quality flag for Vy data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for Vy data:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain 6-good (F17) 7-fair (F17) 8-caution (F17) 9-caution (sun glint or high-energy particles)

Parameter.Name: vy rms
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Standard deviation of the Vy flow
Parameter.Caveats: standard deviation of the six Vy samples taken per second in the normal mode, fill data in slow mode

Parameter.Name: roughness Vy
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Roughness parameter of Vy
Parameter.Caveats: roughness parameter of Vy defined as (delta Vy / averaged Vy)

Parameter.Name: vz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vz - ion flow in the vertical crosstrack direction
Parameter.Caveats: crosstrack vertical ion flow from IDM, positive is in the upward direction, data taken in two modes: normal and slow (see nmbpts)

Parameter.Name: quality flag for Vz data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for Vz data:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain 6-good (F17) 7-fair (F17) 8-caution (F17) 9-caution (sun glint or high-energy particles)

Parameter.Name: stdev vz rms
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Standard deviation of the Vz flow
Parameter.Caveats: standard deviation of the six Vz samples taken per second in the normal mode, fill data in slow mode

Parameter.Name: roughness Vz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Roughness parameter of Vz (delta Vz / averaged Vz)
Parameter.Caveats: roughness parameter of Vy defined as (delta Vy / averaged Vy)

Parameter.Name: ion temperature
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ion temperature
Parameter.Caveats: temperature of the ions in the plasma calculated from the fit to the RPA curve

Parameter.Name: Quality flag for the ion temperature
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for the ion temperature:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

RenderingHints.AxisLabel: Quality flag for the ion temperature

Parameter.Name: electron temperature
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Electron temperature
Parameter.Caveats: the electron temperature based on an onboard calculation of the Langmuir probe sweep which occurs once every 4 s

Parameter.Name: ion density
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ni calculated from the RPA
Parameter.Caveats: Ion density of the plasma calculated from the fit to the RPA curve

Parameter.Name: density quality flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for the ion density:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: ion density scint meter
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ni from scintillation meter
Parameter.Caveats: the average of the 24 Hz samples of the ion density by the scintillation meter, because of its large aperture this is considered the best meaure of the ion density

Parameter.Name: roughness SM den
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Roughness parameter of SM density
Parameter.Caveats: roughness parameter of scintillation meter ion density defined as (delta Ni/ averaged Ni)

Parameter.Name: ion density RPA 0 volts
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ni measured from the RPA at 0 volts
Parameter.Caveats: during each RPA sweep there is a point where the repeller voltage is 0 V so all the ions reach the collector, this is the ion density based on that measurement

Parameter.Name: ion density IDM
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Ni from the IDM
Parameter.Caveats: the ion density based on the collector current in the IDM, because some or all of the light ions are excluded this density should always be equal to or less than the other ion densities

Parameter.Name: frac H+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Fractional amount of H+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Caveats: fractional amount of the plasma that is H+ based on the fitting of the RPA curve, because of uncertainties the value can exceed 1.0; disregard > 1.05 and negative

Parameter.Name: frac H+ quality flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for fractional H+:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: frac He+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Fractional amount of He+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Caveats: fractional amount of the plasma that is He+ based on the fitting of the RPA curve, because of uncertainties the value can exceed 1.0; disregard > 1.05 and negative

Parameter.Name: frac He+ quality flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for fractional He+:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: frac O+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Fractional amount of O+ ions in plasma
Parameter.Caveats: fractional amount of the plasma that is O+ based on the fitting of the RPA curve, because of uncertainties the value can exceed 1.0; disregard > 1.05 and negative

Parameter.Name: frac O+ quality flag
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Quality flag for fractional O+:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: high energy particles
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Electron background monitor - high energy particle currents detected by the RPA
Parameter.Caveats: once every 2 s the RPA repeller voltage is set so high that only high energy electrons or ions reach the collector. A large current indicates high-energy particles or photo-electron production (a sun-glint).

Parameter.Name: quality flag for RPA data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Overall quality flag for RPA data:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain

Parameter.Name: quality flag for RPA data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Flag for RPA sweep direction:retarding potential: 1-increasing,2-decreasing [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-retarding potential increasing 2-retarding potential decreasing

Parameter.Name: geographic latitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geographical latitude
Parameter.Caveats: geographic latitude of s/c

Parameter.Name: geographic longitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Geographic east longitude
Parameter.Caveats: geographic east longitude of s/c

Parameter.Name: magnetic latitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Magnetic latitude, mapped to 120 km"
Parameter.Caveats: magnetic latitude of field line at s/c mapped to 120 km

Parameter.Name: magnetic local time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Magnetic local time, mapped to 120 km"
Parameter.Caveats: magnetic local time of field line at s/c mapped to 120 km

Parameter.Name: solar zenith angle
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Solar zenith angle
Parameter.Caveats: angle between the sun-earth line and the s/c-center of earth line

Parameter.Name: altitude
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Altitude
Parameter.Caveats: altitude of the s/c above earth’s surface

Parameter.Name: #pts vy-vz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Number of data points in the Vy - Vz average:1-slow mode,6-normal mode"
Parameter.Caveats: the IDM operates in two modes: normal mode takes six horizontal and six vertical samples per second, slow mode is for low density conditions where only one sample is taken each second and alternates between directions

Parameter.Name: overall quality flag for the IDM data
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: "Overall quality flag for the IDM data:1,6-good;2,7-fair;else warn [READ QUALITY FLAG Document]"
Parameter.Caveats: 1-good 2-fair 3-caution 4-bad 5-uncertain 6-good (F17) 7-fair (F17) 8-caution (F17) 9-caution (sun glint or high-energy particles)

RenderingHints.AxisLabel: overall quality flag for the IDM data

Parameter.Name: spacecraft velocity
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity
Parameter.Caveats: orbital velocity of the spacecraft

Parameter.Name: rpaground
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Potential difference between SSIES instruments and spacecraft ground
Parameter.Caveats: the DMSP spacecraft charges negative relative to the plasma ground so SSIES is electrically insolated and driven positive relative to spacecraft ground to keep the instrument near the plasma ground

Parameter.Name: potential
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Potential of the SSIES instruments relative to the plasma ground
Parameter.Caveats: all the SSIES instruments are held near the plasma ground potential, nominally about -1 V relative to the plasma, this value is calculated from the RPA curve fit, shown as \“SC Potential\” on the plots

Parameter.Name: bx
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: North component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)
Parameter.Caveats: northward component of the Earths magnetic field at the spacecrafts location calculated by the IGRF model

Parameter.Name: by
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: East component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)
Parameter.Caveats: eastward component of the Earths magnetic field at the spacecrafts location calculated by the IGRF model

Parameter.Name: bz
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Vertical downward component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)
Parameter.Caveats: vertical downward component of the Earths magnetic field at the spacecrafts location calculated by the IGRF model

Parameter.Name: corotation vel ram
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Corotation velocity of ionosphere in the ram direction
Parameter.Caveats: the ram component (x) of the corotation speed of the ionosphere at the spacecrafts location

Parameter.Name: corotation vel crosstrack
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Corotation velocity of ionosphere in the horizontal crosstrack direction
Parameter.Caveats: the crosstrack horizontal component (y) of the corotation speed of the ionosphere at the spacecrafts location

Parameter.Name: corotation vel vertical
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: Epoch
Parameter.Description: Corotation velocity of ionosphere in the vertical direction
Parameter.Caveats: the crosstrack vertical component (z) of the corotation speed of the ionosphere at the spacecrafts location, since DMSP is in a circular orbit, this value is zero
